question: Which among the following is not a work of Rabindranath Tagore?
option4: All of the above are works of Rabindranath Tagore
answer: All of the above are works of Rabindranath Tagore
explanation: The Gardener was published in 1913. Gitanjali was published in 1910, The King of the Dark Chamber (Originally Raja, 1910) was published in 1914. In the year 1913, he won Nobel prize (First non-European) in literature.
